text.name: Dimension Shredder
text.desc:
Targets the rearmost unit (In regular encounters)

[BeforeAttack] Gain +3 [Charge] Count; Gain 2 [Agility] next turn

text.name: Dimension Shredder
text.desc:
Targets the rearmost unit (In regular encounters)

[BeforeAttack] Gain +5 [Charge] Count; Gain 2 [Agility] next turn

passiveList.name: Entangled Phenomena Restoration
passiveList.desc:
When hitting an enemy with negative status effects, this unit gains +1 Charge Count. 
(Max +4 per turn.)
When HP falls to 0 for the first time during battle, spend all Charge Count and heal in proportion to the amount spent. (Cannot heal over 25% Max HP.)

text.name: Dimension Shredder
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets the unit with the most HP

[BeforeAttack] Gain 2 [Agility] next turn
Spend 10 Charge Count to inflict +1 more [Vulnerable] and [DimensionRift] On Hit with this Skill

text.name: Dimension Shredder
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets the unit with the most HP

[BeforeAttack] Gain <style="highlight">3 [Agility] next turn
Spend 10 Charge Count to inflict <style="highlight">+2 more [Vulnerable] and [DimensionRift] On Hit with this Skill
